node.desc: a long-acting barbiturate that depresses most metabolic processes at high doses. it is used as a hypnotic and sedative and may induce dependence. this drug is also used in veterinary practice for central nervous system depression.

node.name: cathine
node.desc: this drug (Î²-hydroxyamphetamine) is a monoamine alkaloid found in the shrub catha edulis (khat). this drug is a schedule iii drug under the convention on psychotropic substances. in the united states, it is classified as a schedule iv controlled substance.

node.name: benzoylecgonine
node.desc: this drug is the major metabolite of cocaine. it is formed by hydrolysis of cocaine in the liver, catalysed by carboxylesterases. it is excreted in the urine of cocaine users after processing in the liver.

node.name: 17alpha-methyl-4-hydroxynandrolone
node.desc: this drug is a schedule 3 anabolic steroid.

node.name: boldenone
node.desc: this drug is an anabolic steroid developed for veterinary use, mostly for treatment of horses. it is not indicated for use in humans in the us and is only available through veterinary clinics.

node.name: rolicyclidine
node.desc: this drug (pcpy) is a dissociative anesthetic drug with hallucinogenic and sedative effects. due to its similarity in effects to pcp, pcpy was placed into the schedule i list of illegal drugs in the 1970s, although it has never been widely abused and is now little known.

node.name: clotiazepam
node.desc: this drug is a benzodiazepine derivative, not approved for sale in the u.s. or canada, but has been approved in the u.k. it is a schedule iv drug in canada.

node.name: chloral_hydrate
node.desc: a hypnotic and sedative used in the treatment of insomnia. the safety margin is too narrow for this drug to be used as a general anesthetic in humans, but it is commonly used for that purpose in animal experiments. it is no longer considered useful as an anti-anxiety medication.

node.name: fludiazepam
node.desc: this drug is a drug which is a benzodiazepine derivative. it possesses anxiolytic, anticonvulsant, sedative and skeletal muscle relaxant properties. it is a scheduled drug in the u.s., but is approved for use in japan.

node.name: dextroamphetamine
node.desc: this drug is the dextrorotary stereoisomer of the amphetamine molecule, which can take two different forms. it is a slightly polar, weak base and is lipophilic.

node.name: metrizamide
node.desc: this drug is a solute for density gradient centrifugation offering higher maximum solution density without the problems of increased viscosity. it is also used as a resorbable, non-ionic contrast medium.

node.name: phendimetrazine
node.desc: this drug is a weight loss medication. this drug is chemically related to amphetamines and is a schedule iii drug under the convention on psychotropic substances. in the united states, this drug is a schedule iii controlled substance under the uniform controlled substances act of 1970.

node.name: ketazolam
node.desc: this drug is a drug which is a benzodiazepine derivative. it possesses anxiolytic, anticonvulsant, sedative and skeletal muscle relaxant properties. this drug is not approved for sale in the united states or canada.

node.name: prazepam
node.desc: this drug is a benzodiazepine that is used in the treatment of anxiety disorders. it is a schedule iv drug in the u.s.

node.name: quazepam
node.desc: this drug is a drug which is a benzodiazepine derivative. it induces impairment of motor function and has hypnotic properties. this drug is used to treat insomnia.

node.name: solifenacin
node.desc: this drug (rinn), marketed as this drug succinate under the trade name vesicare, is a urinary antispasmodic of the anticholinergic class. it is used in the treatment of overactive bladder with urge incontinence.

node.name: cinolazepam
node.desc: this drug is a benzodiazepine derivative. it possesses anxiolytic, anticonvulsant, sedative and skeletal muscle relaxant properties. this drug is not approved for sale in the united states or canada.

node.name: tiaprofenic_acid
node.desc: this drug is a non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug of the arylpropionic acid (profen) class, used to treat pain, especially arthritic pain.

node.name: lopinavir
node.desc: this drug (abt-378) is an antiretroviral of the protease inhibitor class. it is marketed by abbott as kaletra, a co-formulation with a sub-therapeutic dose of ritonavir, as a component of combination therapy to treat hiv/aids.

node.name: pivmecillinam
node.desc: this drug is a mecillinam prodrug, a pivaloyloxymethyl ester of amdinocillin that is well absorbed orally, but broken down to amdinocillin in the intestinal mucosa. it is active against gram-negative organisms and used as for amdinocillin.

node.name: tazobactam
node.desc: this drug is a antibacterial penicillin derivative which inhibits the action of bacterial beta-lactamases.

node.name: deferasirox
node.desc: this drug is an oral iron chelator. its main use is to reduce chronic iron overload in patients who are receiving long term blood transfusions for conditions such as beta-thalassemia and other chronic anemias. it is the first oral medication approved in the usa for this purpose.

node.name: acepromazine
node.desc: this drug is one of the phenothiazine derivative psychotropic drugs, used little in humans, however frequently in animals as a sedative and antiemetic.

node.name: aceprometazine
node.desc: this drug (inn) is a prescription drug with neuroleptic and anti-histamine properties. it is not widely prescribed. it may be used in combination with meprobamate for the treatment of sleep disorders. this combination is available in france under the trade name mepronizine.

node.name: isopropamide
node.desc: this drug iodide is a long-acting quaternary anticholinergic drug. it is used in the treatment of peptic ulcer and other gastrointestinal disorders marked by hyperacidity and hypermotility.
